metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4245 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in codehaus-plexus. The org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.XmlWriterUtil#writeComment fails to sanitize comments for a --> sequence. This issue means that text contained in the command string could be interpreted as XML and allow for XML injection.

criterions.comment: plexus-utils2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
